The diagram displays a configuration output example of Dynamic PAT and an example of output seen when verifying PAT.

Dynamic PAT
The output from the show running-config command is listed below:

R1# show running-config

interface serial 0 /0 /0

IP nat outside

A man sitting at a desk in front of a computer says, I have to configure PAT since we are converting all of our private addresses into one public address.
